initial_message: [2024] I started a new position as Assistant Professor at Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE)
[2024] Francisco was re-elected coordinator of the Special Committee on Virtual Realiy (CERV) of the Brazilian Computer Society (SBC) to work from 2024-2026.
[2024] 1 Paper published at WACV 2024 (h5-index: 95): Attention Modules Improve Image-Level Anomaly Detection for Industrial Inspection: A DifferNet Case Study.
[2023] 1 Paper published at International Journal of Remote Sensing (Impact factor: 3.4): InsPLAD: A Dataset and Benchmark for Power Line Asset Inspection in UAV Images.
[2023] 1 Paper published at SVR 2023: Automating the audit of the Brazilian electronic ballot operation: A new dataset for 6DoF pose estimation of the voter terminal based on domain randomization.
[2023] 1 Paper published at VISAPP 2023: FedBID and FedDocs: A Dataset and System for Federated Document Analysis.
[2023] 1 Paper published at IEEE ACCESS (Impact factor: 3.476): Towards VR in VR: Assessing Engagement and Social Interaction in a Virtual Conference.
[2022] Francisco was elected coordinator of the Special Committee on Virtual Realiy (CERV) of the Brazilian Computer Society (SBC) to work from 2022-2024.
[2022] 1 Paper published at Pattern Recognition Letters (PRL)(Impact factor: 4.757): The impact of domain randomization on cross-device monocular deep 6DoF detection.
1 Paper published at Machine Vision and Applications (MVA)(Impact factor: 2.983): 3D pedestrian localization using multiple cameras: a generalizable approach.
1 Paper accepted at SIBGRAPI 2021: STN PLAD: A Dataset for Multi-Size Power Line Assets Detection in High-Resolution UAV Images.
Invited talk at the 2021 China National EDUxIndustry summit. Title: Extended Reality (XR) research in Brazil: Opportunities through the lenses of EDUxIndustry collaboration.
1 Paper accepted at the CVPR2021 Workshop LatinX in CV (LXCV) Generalizable Multi-Camera 3D Pedestrian Detection.
Best Paper at SIBGRAPI 2020 from my PhD student Kelvin Cunha: A Study on the Impact of Domain Randomization for Monocular Deep 6DoF Pose Estimation!
I will be Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
message_after_date1: I am a Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
message_after_date2: Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
